1.content:
One of these characters is wandering through the Dragon Pens, cleaning and replacing the feeding troughs, when they suddenly zap and flash away in a flash of light!

When they wake up, they’ve shrunk!
1.title: Character selection!

info.brief_description: A story about any HTTYD character, shrinking, and having to deal with it. Vore preferred.
info.description:
As the title says! A character from HTTYD shrinks down to the size smaller than a doll, and has to find a way to survive.

Almost anything goes! I’d love to see submissions. :D we need more HTTYD stuff like this.
info.pretty_title: How To Train Your Dragon; shrinking!
